languages.text: {n}Глаза инквизитора стекленеют.{/n} "Вы... что сделали? Мы говорим не о пистолете, автопере или чувстве стыда. Мы говорим о дознавателе Инквизиции. Моем агенте. Нельзя "потерять" моего агента... без последствий".

{n}The Lord Inquisitor's eyes turn flinty.{/n} "You did what? We are not talking about a pistol, or an autoquill, or your sense of shame. We are talking about an Interrogator of the Inquisition. My agent. No one 'loses' my agent. Not without consequences."
languages.original_text: {n}Глаза инквизитора стекленеют.{/n} "Вы... что сделали? Мы говорим не о пистолете, автопере или чувстве стыда. Мы говорим о дознавателе Инквизиции. Моем агенте. Нельзя "потерять" моего агента... без последствий".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's eyes turn flinty.{/n} "You did what? We are not talking about a pistol, or an autopen, or your sense of shame. We are talking about an Interrogator of the Inquisition. My agent. No one 'loses' my agent. Not without consequences."

{n}The Lord Inquisitor's eyes turn flinty.{/n} "You did what? We are not talking about a pistol, or an autopen, or your sense of shame. We are talking about an Interrogator of the Inquisition. My agent. No one 'loses' my agent. Not without consequences."

{n}The Lord Inquisitor's eyes turn flinty.{/n} "You did what? We are not talking about a pistol, or an autopen, or your sense of shame. We are talking about an Interrogator of the Inquisition. My agent. No one 'loses' my agent. Not without consequences."

{n}The Lord Inquisitor's eyes turn flinty.{/n} "You did what? We are not talking about a pistol, or an autopen, or your sense of shame. We are talking about an Interrogator of the Inquisition. My agent. No one 'loses' my agent. Not without consequences."

languages.text: {n}审判长的目光变得冷硬无情。{/n}“你刚刚说什么？我们谈论的可不是一把手枪、一支自动羽毛笔，或是你的羞耻感。我们谈论的是审判庭的审讯官，是我的特工。没有人能‘失去’我的特工，敢这么做的人，都会付出代价。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's eyes turn flinty.{/n} "You did what? We are not talking about a pistol, or an autoquill, or your sense of shame. We are talking about an Interrogator of the Inquisition. My agent. No one 'loses' my agent. Not without consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}审判长的目光变得冷硬无情。{/n}“你刚刚说什么？我们谈论的可不是一把手枪、一支自动羽毛笔，或是你的羞耻感。我们谈论的是审判庭的审讯官，是我的特工。没有人能‘失去’我的特工，敢这么做的人，都会付出代价。”

languages.text: {n}La mirada del Lord Inquisidor se vuelve fría.{/n} «¿Que ha qué? No estamos hablando de una pistola, de una pluma automática o de su sentido de la vergüenza, sino de un interrogador de la Inquisición. De mi agente. Nadie "pierde" a uno de mis agentes. No impunemente».
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's eyes turn flinty.{/n} "You did what? We are not talking about a pistol, or an autoquill, or your sense of shame. We are talking about an Interrogator of the Inquisition. My agent. No one 'loses' my agent. Not without consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}La mirada del Lord Inquisidor se vuelve fría.{/n} «¿Que ha qué? No estamos hablando de una pistola, de una pluma automática o de su sentido de la vergüenza, sino de un interrogador de la Inquisición. De mi agente. Nadie "pierde" a uno de mis agentes. No impunemente».

languages.text: {n}ロード・インクィジターが冷酷な目つきになる。{/n}「何をしたって？拳銃も自動書記も、お前の恥の意識の話も関係ない。異端審問庁のインテロゲイター、私の諜報員について話している。誰も私の諜報員を『失う』ことなど許されない。相応の結果なしにはな」
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's eyes turn flinty.{/n} "You did what? We are not talking about a pistol, or an autoquill, or your sense of shame. We are talking about an Interrogator of the Inquisition. My agent. No one 'loses' my agent. Not without consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}ロード・インクィジターが冷酷な目つきになる。{/n}「何をしたって？拳銃も自動書記も、お前の恥の意識の話も関係ない。異端審問庁のインテロゲイター、私の諜報員について話している。誰も私の諜報員を『失う』ことなど許されない。相応の結果なしにはな」

languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's eyes turn flinty.{/n} "You did what? We are not talking about a pistol, or an autopen, or your sense of shame. We are talking about an Interrogator of the Inquisition. My agent. No one 'loses' my agent. Not without consequences."

languages.text: {n}Die Augen des Großinquisitors funkeln.{/n} "Ihr habt was? Wir reden hier nicht von einer Pistole, einer Autofeder oder Eurem Schamgefühl. Wir reden von einem Interrogator der Inquisition. Meinem Agenten. Niemand 'verliert' meinen Agenten. Nicht ohne Konsequenzen."
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's eyes turn flinty.{/n} "You did what? We are not talking about a pistol, or an autoquill, or your sense of shame. We are talking about an Interrogator of the Inquisition. My agent. No one 'loses' my agent. Not without consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Augen des Großinquisitors funkeln.{/n} "Ihr habt was? Wir reden hier nicht von einer Pistole, einer Autofeder oder Eurem Schamgefühl. Wir reden von einem Interrogator der Inquisition. Meinem Agenten. Niemand 'verliert' meinen Agenten. Nicht ohne Konsequenzen."

languages.text: « Vous l'avez quoi ? {n}répète le seigneur inquisiteur avec un regard dur et froid comme la glace.{/n} Nous ne parlons pas d'une arme, d'une autoplume ou de votre capacité à éprouver la moindre honte. Nous parlons d'un interrogateur de l'Inquisition. De mon agent. Personne ne "perd" mes agents. Du moins, pas sans en subir les conséquences. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's eyes turn flinty.{/n} "You did what? We are not talking about a pistol, or an autoquill, or your sense of shame. We are talking about an Interrogator of the Inquisition. My agent. No one 'loses' my agent. Not without consequences."

traits.locale_text: « Vous l'avez quoi ? {n}répète le seigneur inquisiteur avec un regard dur et froid comme la glace.{/n} Nous ne parlons pas d'une arme, d'une autoplume ou de votre capacité à éprouver la moindre honte. Nous parlons d'un interrogateur de l'Inquisition. De mon agent. Personne ne "perd" mes agents. Du moins, pas sans en subir les conséquences. »

languages.text: {n}Lord Engizisyoncu'nun bakışları sertleşiyor.{/n} "Ne yaptın? Bir tabancadan veya bir otoyazardan veya senin utanma duygundan bahsetmiyoruz burada. Engizisyon'un bir Sorgucu'sundan bahsediyoruz. Benim adamımdan. Kimse benim adamımı 'kaybedemez'. Kaybederse de sonuçlarına katlanır."
languages.original_text: {n}The Lord Inquisitor's eyes turn flinty.{/n} "You did what? We are not talking about a pistol, or an autoquill, or your sense of shame. We are talking about an Interrogator of the Inquisition. My agent. No one 'loses' my agent. Not without consequences."

traits.locale_text: {n}Lord Engizisyoncu'nun bakışları sertleşiyor.{/n} "Ne yaptın? Bir tabancadan veya bir otoyazardan veya senin utanma duygundan bahsetmiyoruz burada. Engizisyon'un bir Sorgucu'sundan bahsediyoruz. Benim adamımdan. Kimse benim adamımı 'kaybedemez'. Kaybederse de sonuçlarına katlanır."
